reviewText: Let me tell you, these movie rock. My favorite movie in there is The Blues Brother because its my favorite SNL characters in action to save a church. National Lampons Animal House was amazing and I couldn't stop laughing. The Jerk is a personal favorite and I'm so happy i can watch in when ever i want now and Car Wash was good but nothing compared to the other three movies but it's still good. I think you just love the other three movies so much the Car Wash really isn't the best in there but its still good. For anyone who thinks John Belushi isn't good you should watch Animal House and Blues Brothers because they are amazing and you will change your mind instantly. BELUSHI ROCKS
summary: Theres a reason John Belushi is the best
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: You watched them 30 years ago .. great fun classics in comedy .. on disc.  Great value even for just the Blues Brothers.  A must-have in every Boomer's collection.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: This is a good collection of classic comedies from Universal. Animal House and Blues Brothers are true classics and are hilarious (everyone miss John Belushi?). The Jerk is an interesting movie with Steve Martin playing the gullible, village idiot so well (his fake drunk voice is horrible and quite annoying). Car Wash was definitely my least favorite of the four. I think it's interesting that Richard Pryor is listed as essentially the main character (the way it's promoted), yet he has what a 5 minute cameo part in the entire movie that comes with no lead-up and leaves with no follow-up. Overall really good collection of classic comedies with legendary comedians.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: I like getting four movies on four separate disc,so awesome,very pleased.We enjoyed all these movies at a cheap price.Highly recommend.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: These are the longer versions and one really needs to make time for them. I espeacially liked the 'extras' in the movie "The Jerk". They give a little ukulalie(sp?) lesson for the song Steve & Bernidet sing together-"You Belong To Me". Although to be honest about the rest of the movies,they seemed funnier when they first came out...?? But I'm sure the more I play them and start to remember their nastalgia with more down time to give them I believe will put the ole' smile back on my face again.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: Unlike the better movie collections, this one has two movies on each disc instead of the more preferable one movie per disc. If you are picky about view quality you may wantto pass on this collection. It's ok but not the best.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: These movies are must haves if you love comedy. It will make you cry laughing at the best actors in comedy.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: this four pack is well worth it the Blues brother as extra scenes in it Animal House is excellent looking the jerk is still funny at the carwash is a classic enjoyed watching them all all over again
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)

reviewText: Bought this for my girlfriends parent's. Each movie is a classic and a great addition to the collection. Would recommend to any dvd buyer.
Title: Comedy Greats Spotlight Collection (National Lampoon's Animal House / The Blues Brothers / The Jerk / Car Wash)
